Package Mediator

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • Mediator.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, utility.observer.listener.GeneralListener<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>, utility.observer.listener.RemoteListener<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>, utility.observer.subject.GeneralSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>, utility.observer.subject.LocalSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>
    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements utility.observer.listener.RemoteListener<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>, utility.observer.subject.LocalSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>
    A Client class that calls methods on the remote server via stub.
    Version:
    3.0 - 01.06.21
    Author:
    Group 1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Client()
      Zero-argument constructor initializing the RemoteModel instance variable to the remote server stub downloaded from the registry.

      • login

        public void login​(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password)
        Passing login credentials to the server for verification. Catches RemoteExceptions and prints the stack trace.
        Parameters:
        username - String of the username
        password - String of the password

      • addUser

                    java.lang.String password)
        Passing credentials to the server for verification to create a new User object. Catches RemoteExceptions and prints the stack trace.
        Parameters:
        username - String of the username
        password - String of the password

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe​(java.lang.String thread,
                      java.lang.String username)
        Adding a forum thread title to a user's subscription list. Catches RemoteExceptions and prints the stack trace.
        Parameters:
        thread - String of the forum thread's title
        username - String of the subscribing user's username

      • isSubscribed

        public boolean isSubscribed​(java.lang.String thread,
                            java.lang.String username)
        Boolean checking if a user is subscribed to a given forum thread. Catches RemoteExceptions, prints the stack trace and returns 'false'.
        Parameters:
        thread - String of the forum thread's title
        username - String of a user's username
        Returns:
        'true' if the given thread is on the given user's subscription list, 'false' if not or a RemoteException is thrown

      • unsubscribe

        public void unsubscribe​(java.lang.String thread,
                        java.lang.String username)
        Removing a forum thread title from a user's subscriptions. Catches RemoteExceptions and prints the stack trace.
        Parameters:
        thread - String of the forum thread's title
        username - String of the unsubscribing user's username

        public void updateProfile​(Profile profile)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Setter for the profile instance variables contained in a Profile object.
        Parameters:
        profile - Profile object containing the new profile to send to the Server
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException

      • profileInfo

        public Profile profileInfo​(java.lang.String username)
        Getter for a Profile object containing a user's public profile details. Catches RemoteExceptions, prints the stack trace and returns null.
        Parameters:
        username - String of the username to search for
        Returns:
        Profile object created based on the user found from the String argument or null if a RemoteException is thrown

                              java.lang.String username)
        Adding a comment to the specified topic. Catches RemoteExceptions and prints the stack trace.
        Parameters:
        topicTitle - String of the topic to which comment should be appended
        message - String of the comment
        username - String of the username that is adding the comment

      • getForum

        public Forum getForum()
        Fetches the Forum from the Server. Catches RemoteExceptions, prints the stack trace and returns null.
        Returns:
        Forum object which contains all the topics and comments or null if a RemoteException is thrown

      • getFaqs

        public FAQ getFaqs()
        Fetches the FAQ from the Server. Catches RemoteExceptions, prints the stack trace and returns null.
        Returns:
        FAQ object which contains all topics, questions and answers or null if a RemoteException is thrown

      • getArticles

        public ArticleList getArticles()
        Fetches the list of articles from the Server. Catches RemoteExceptions, prints the stack trace and returns null.
        Returns:
        ArticleList object which contains all the Article objects or null if a RemoteException is thrown

      • services

        public java.util.ArrayList<Service> services()
        Fetches all the services from the Server. Catches RemoteExceptions, prints the stack trace and returns null.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Service objects that contain all the services within the system or null if a RemoteException is thrown

      • facilities

        public java.util.ArrayList<Facility> facilities()
        Fetches all the facilities from the Server. Catches RemoteExceptions, prints the stack trace and returns null.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Facility objects that contain all the facilities within the system or null if a RemoteException is thrown

      • getComments

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getComments​(java.lang.String forumTopic)
        Loads all the comments from the Server for the specified topic. Catches RemoteExceptions, prints the stack trace and returns null.
        Parameters:
        forumTopic - String of the topic title
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Strings that contain all the comments for the specified topic or null if a RemoteException is thrown

      • getServices

        public java.util.ArrayList<Service> getServices​(java.lang.String searchInfo)
        Loads all the services that match the search criteria. Catches RemoteExceptions, prints the stack trace and returns null.
        Parameters:
        searchInfo - String of criteria by which the ArrayList of Service objects will be populated
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Service objects that match the criteria or null if a RemoteException is thrown

      • getFacilities

        public java.util.ArrayList<Facility> getFacilities​(java.lang.String info)
        Fetches all the facilities from the Server matching the search String. Catches RemoteExceptions, prints the stack trace and returns null.
        Parameters:
        info - String to search by
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Facility objects that contain all the facilities within the system that match the search or null if a RemoteException is thrown

      • userSearch

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> userSearch​(java.lang.String search)
        Fetches all the usernames from the Server matching the search String. Catches RemoteExceptions, prints the stack trace and returns null.
        Parameters:
        search - String to search by
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Strings that contain the usernames within the system that match the search or null if a RemoteException is thrown

        public void addFriend​(java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String friend)
        Adding a user to a user's friends. Catches RemoteExceptions and prints the stack trace.
        Parameters:
        username - String of username by which the specific user is found
        friend - String of criteria by which the soon-to-be-friend will be found

      • unfriend

        public void unfriend​(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String friend)
        Removing a user from a user's list of friends. Catches RemoteExceptions and prints the stack trace.
        Parameters:
        username - String of username by which the specific user is found
        friend - String of criteria by which the ex-friend will be found

      • getFriendsList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFriendsList​(java.lang.String username)
        Gets a user's list of friend user's usernames. Catches RemoteExceptions, prints the stack trace and returns null.
        Parameters:
        username - String of criteria by which the specific user is found
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Strings containing the usernames of friends that the specific user has or null if a RemoteException is thrown

      • isFriend

        public boolean isFriend​(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String friend)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Checks whether a user is already a friend of a specific user or not. Catches RemoteExceptions and prints the stack trace.
        Parameters:
        username - String of criteria by which the user is found
        friend - String of criteria by which the specific friend will be found
        Returns:
        'true' if the friend String is already in the first user's friend list, otherwise 'false'.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if a RemoteException is thrown = "Could not retrieve data from the server database"

      • isProfessional

        public boolean isProfessional​(java.lang.String username)
        Checks whether a user is a professional. Catches RemoteExceptions and prints the stack trace.
        Parameters:
        username - String of criteria by which the user is found
        Returns:
        'true' if the user is already a professional, otherwise 'false'.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if a RemoteException is thrown = "Could not retrieve data from the server database"

      • professionalApplication

        public void professionalApplication​(java.lang.String username)
        Changing a user's professional status. Catches RemoteExceptions and prints the stack trace.
        Parameters:
        username - String of the user's username who is to be altered

      • addReport

        public void addReport​(java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String report)
        Adding a user's list of reported users. Catches RemoteExceptions and prints the stack trace.
        Parameters:
        username - String of the reporters username
        report - String of the reportee's username

      • getReportList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getReportList​(java.lang.String username)
        Getter for a list of usernames the given user has reported. Catches RemoteExceptions, prints the stack trace and returns null.
        Parameters:
        username - String of the username to search for
        Returns:
        a String ArrayList of users that have been reported by the argument user or null if a RemoteException is thrown

      • againReported

        public boolean againReported​(java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String report)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Boolean checking whether a user has already reported a specific user.
        Parameters:
        username - String to search for and get list of reports from
        report - String of the username to check if it's already been reported by the user
        Returns:
        'true' if the user with this username has already reported the user with the second String as a username, returns 'false' if not or null if a RemoteException is thrown
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if a RemoteException is thrown = "Could not retrieve data from the server database"

      • addListener

        public boolean addListener​(utility.observer.listener.GeneralListener<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> listener,
                           java.lang.String... propertyNames)
        Description copied from interface: utility.observer.subject.LocalSubject
        Adding a listener either to all events or to one or more property names.
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface utility.observer.subject.GeneralSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface utility.observer.subject.LocalSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to be added
        propertyNames - a var-args list of property names. If empty, then the listener should be added as a lister for all events.
        Returns:
        true if the listener has been added. It is optional if this return true if the listener has been added to at least one of the property names or if it successfully has been added to all listed

        propertyNames - a var-args list of property names. If empty, then the listener should be removed as a lister for all events.
        Returns:
